    Create Database

    Name and Template! Enter a meaningful name for your database and choose a database template.
    Customise! the template settings below.
     

    Change usecase values

    By changing the usecase, you will be updating the options set in the form below.

    Press Continue to accept the new values. Close will leave the selected usecase and the old form values.
